This class is the entry class that provides access to the Pass package.

This class provides all the fingerprint management functionality.

This listener interface receives fingerprint recognition events.
SpassFingerprint.RegisterListener - Interface in com.samsung.android.sdk.pass
This listener interface receives fingerprint registration events.
SpassInvalidStateException - Exception in com.samsung.android.sdk.pass
This exception is thrown to indicate that identify request is denied because of fingerprint Service internally.

Constructs a SpassInvalidStateException class with the specified detail message and error type.
SsdkUnsupportedException - Exception in com.samsung.android.sdk
This exception is thrown to indicate that vendor is not Samsung or device does not supported, or SDK version does not match.
SsdkUnsupportedException(String, int) - Constructor for exception com.samsung.android.sdk.SsdkUnsupportedException
Constructs a SsdkUnsupportedException class with the specified detail message and error type.

Requests the identify operation to recognize user fingerprints.

Requests the identify operation to recognize the user fingerprint with a user interface.
STATUS_AUTHENTIFICATION_FAILED - Static variable in class com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.SpassFingerprint
Status indicating the failure of the fingerprint recognition due to an unknown reason.
STATUS_AUTHENTIFICATION_PASSWORD_SUCCESS - Static variable in class com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.SpassFingerprint
Status indicating the success of the identify operation using an alternative password instead of a fingerprint.
STATUS_AUTHENTIFICATION_SUCCESS - Static variable in class com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.SpassFingerprint
Status indicating the success of the identify operation.
STATUS_OPERATION_DENIED - Static variable in exception com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.SpassInvalidStateException
This state is returned if identify request is denied when fingerprint request is denied when fingerprint identify is blocked due to fingerprint identify failed 5 attempts, or while 30 second timer occurs due to password identify failed 5 attempts.
STATUS_QUALITY_FAILED - Static variable in class com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.SpassFingerprint
Status indicating the failure of the fingerprint recognition due to the poor quality of the fingerprint image.
STATUS_SENSOR_FAILED - Static variable in class com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.SpassFingerprint
Status indicating the failure of the fingerprint recognition due to a sensor error.
STATUS_TIMEOUT_FAILED - Static variable in class com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.SpassFingerprint
Status indicating the failure of the fingerprint recognition due to a timeout.
STATUS_USER_CANCELLED - Static variable in class com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.SpassFingerprint
Status indicating the failure of the fingerprint recognition due to a cancellation by the user.
STATUS_USER_CANCELLED_BY_TOUCH_OUTSIDE - Static variable in class com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.SpassFingerprint
Status indicating the failure of the fingerprint recognition due to a cancellation as touching the dialog outside by the user.
